de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.testdatastore

Class DatastoreBaseTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.testdatastore.DatastoreBaseTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractTypeHandlerTest, TestBaseTest, TestEmbeddedEntity, TestEncoder, TestGeoSearch, TestIndex, TestKeyGenerator, TestListExtrems, TestMassInsert, TestOnlyIdMapper, TestQueryHelper, TestRoundtrip, TestSimpleMapper, TestSimpleMapperQuery, TestStoreObject, TestTrigger

    public abstract class DatastoreBaseTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Base test to init an IDataStore for working with an IDataStore. See method getDataStore(TestContext) on how to init

    • Method Detail

      • getDataStore

        public static de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.IDataStore getDataStore(io.vertx.ext.unit.TestContext context)
        Retrive a datastore to work with. If the datastore is not yet initialized, it is done by reading several system properties:
        • IDatastoreContainer: defines the container class to be used. Currently possible is de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.mongo.vertxunit.MongoDataStoreContainer for mongodb and de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.mysql.MySqlDataStoreContainer for mysql
        For datastore specific system properties to be set see MySqlDataStoreinit.createSettings() or MongoDataStoreInit.createSettings()
        Parameters:
        context -
        Returns:
